solution: The greatest integer less than $-2.54$ is $-3$; the smallest integer greater than $25.4$ is $26$. So $\lfloor -2.54 \rfloor + \lceil 25.4 \rceil = -3+26=\boxed{23}$.
chatgpt_solution: The greatest integer less than or equal to $-2.54$ is $-3,$ and the least integer greater than or equal to $25.4$ is $26.$  Therefore, $\lfloor-2.54\rfloor + \lceil25.4\rceil = -3 + 26 = \boxed{23}.$
